resources.string: Dont have an account? Register Now
Dont have an account? Login Now
Welcome back! Glad to see you, Again!

Hello Dear user You can reset your password by simple steps.First enter your email which was registered previously. Click on submit button then you will get a email and check it and reset your password kindly.

1.If you forgot your password try to logout from the application and select "Recover Password" enter your email and submit it.You will get a mail from app and recover your password."
""
"
2.Any payment issues go to profile select ContactUs option and send your issue to us we will rectify as soon as possible."
""
"
3.We try to fix some bugs in this app.In case you have find any bugs in this application send me a mail about that bug and you will get to chance a 1000 coins."
""
"
4.Once you have submit your payment.We will add money in which payment method you have ro selected so carefully entered valid details and submit it.""
"
"
5.Once you registered in this application you cannot add second account.Please try to remember your registered information.
